pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, August 20, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Navan, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the official groundbreaking event for the new Amazon fulfillment centre. A media availability will follow.

5225 Boundary Road

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.
